Information Description: Ever wanted to try running your own pizzeria? Figure out how the pizza business works in this cooking game, run your own pizza shop and learn to fill orders quickly for a fast food restaurant. Rating: Added on: Jul 23, 2008 Play Count: 38684 File Size: 2.34 Mb If you liked Papas Pizza, you may also enjoy... Perfect Pizza Perfect Pizza Game Pizza Shack Pizza Shack Game. Control 4 machines to make pizza: fries machine, shake machine (milkshakes), pizza machine and chicken machine.
